pages.title: Netherite Sword
pages.text: $(li)The Netherite Sword is the direct upgrade of the $(l:patchouli:weapons/diamond_sword)Diamond Sword$(/l).$(br)$(li)This one inflicts more damage and has more durability than the last one.

pages.name: Netherite Sword
pages.text: This item can't be burned in fire or lava.
